info.title: NOMIS Synchronisation API
info.description: Controls writing Prisoner information back to NOMIS for data synchronistion (not intended for general usage)

get.description: Requires role NOMIS_SENTENCING. Retrieves a sentence adjustment by id

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_SENTENCING not present

put.summary: Updates specific sentence adjustment. The related booking and sentence can not be changed
put.description: Requires role NOMIS_SENTENCING. Updates a sentence adjustment by id

200.description: the sentence adjustment has been updated

400.description: Supplied data is invalid, for instance missing required fields or invalid values. See schema for details

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_SENTENCING not present

delete.description: Requires role NOMIS_SENTENCING. Deletes a sentence adjustment by id

204.description: the sentence adjustment has been deleted

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_SENTENCING not present

put.description: Updates details of an existing visit such as the visitors and time slot

404.description: offenderNo or visits id does not exist

get.description: Requires role NOMIS_SENTENCING. Retrieves a key date adjustment by id

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_SENTENCING not present

put.summary: Updates specific key date adjustment. The related booking can not be changed
put.description: Requires role NOMIS_SENTENCING. Updates a sentence adjustment by id

200.description: the key date adjustment has been updated

400.description: Supplied data is invalid, for instance missing required fields or invalid values. See schema for details

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_SENTENCING not present

delete.description: Requires role NOMIS_SENTENCING. Deletes a key date adjustment by id

204.description: the key date adjustment has been deleted

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_SENTENCING not present

get.summary: Gets the global incentive level by code
get.description: Gets a global incentive level by provided code and domain of IEP_LEVEL

404.description: Global Incentive Level does not exist

put.summary: Updates an existing global incentive level
put.description: Updates an existing global incentive level, updateable fields are description and active

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_INCENTIVES not present

get.description: Gets prison incentive level data by provided code and prison

404.description: Prison Incentive Level does not exist

put.description: Creates incentive level data associated with a Prison

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_INCENTIVES not present

put.description: Updates an existing appointment. Requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

400.description: Invalid data such as location or subtype do not exist etc.

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

delete.description: Deletes an existing appointment by actually deleting from the table. Intended for appointments created in error. Requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

put.description: Cancels an existing appointment. Requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

put.description: Updates an activity and associated pay rates. Requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

400.description: Prison, location, program service or iep value do not exist

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

put.description: Recreates schedules from tomorrow. Requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

400.description: There was an error with the request

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

put.description: Updates a course schedule. Requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

404.description: The course schedule does not exist

put.summary: Updates a prisoner's allocation to an activity
put.description: Updates a prisoner's allocation to an activity. Requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

400.description:
One or more of the following is true:
  • the prisoner is not allocated to the course,
  • the course or prisoner does not exist,
  • the end date is missing or invalid,
  • the reason is invalid

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

404.description: The course activity or booking id do not exist

post.summary: Allocates a prisoner to an activity
post.description: Allocates a prisoner to an activity. Requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

201.description: Offender program profile information with created id

400.description:
One or more of the following is true:
  • the booking id does not exist,
  • the prisoner is already allocated,
  • the course is held at a different prison to the prisoner's location,
  • the pay band code does not exist for the given course activity.

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

404.description: The course activity does not exist

post.description: Creates a new visit and decrements the visit balance.

400.description: Prison or person ids do not exist

post.description: Required role NOMIS_SENTENCING Creates a new sentence adjustment (aka Debit/Credit). Key dates will not be recalculated as a side effect of this operation

400.description: Supplied data is invalid, for instance missing required fields or invalid values. See schema for details

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_SENTENCING not present

404.description: Booking or sentence sequence do not exist

post.description: Creates a new incentive using next sequence no.

400.description: Prison or iep value do not exist

post.summary: Creates a new key date adjustment
post.description: Required role NOMIS_SENTENCING Creates a new key date adjustment. Key dates will be recalculated as a side effect of this operation

400.description: Supplied data is invalid, for instance missing required fields or invalid values. See schema for details

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_SENTENCING not present

post.summary: Creates a new global incentive level
post.description: Creates a new global incentive level

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_INCENTIVES not present

post.description: reorders all global incentive levels using provided list of Incentive codes, including inactive. 1-based index

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_INCENTIVES not present

post.description: Creates incentive level data associated with a Prison

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_INCENTIVES not present

post.description: Creates a new appointment. Requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

400.description: Invalid data such as booking or location do not exist etc.

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

post.description: Creates a new activity and associated pay rates. Requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

400.description: Prison, location, program service or iep value do not exist

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

post.summary: Creates or updates an attendance record
post.description: Creates or updates an attendance for the booking and schedule. Requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

post.description: Returns the current event status of a Nomis attendance record. Requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

404.description: The attendance record does not exist

get.summary: get future visit room usage by filter
get.description: Retrieves a list of rooms with usage count for the (filtered) visits. Only future visits are included

parameters.name: prisonIds
parameters.description: Filter results by prison ids (returns all prisons if not specified)

parameters.name: visitTypes
parameters.description: Filter results by visitType (returns all types if not specified)

parameters.name: fromDateTime
parameters.description: Filter results by visits that were created on or after the given timestamp

parameters.name: toDateTime
parameters.description: Filter results by visits that were created on or before the given timestamp

parameters.name: futureVisitsOnly
parameters.description: Filter results by restricting to future visit usage only

200.description: list of visit room and count is returned

get.description: Retrieves a paged list of visits by filter

parameters.name: prisonIds
parameters.description: Filter results by prison ids (returns all prisons if not specified)

parameters.name: visitTypes
parameters.description: Filter results by visitType (returns all types if not specified)

parameters.name: fromDateTime
parameters.description: Filter results by visits that were created on or after the given timestamp

parameters.name: toDateTime
parameters.description: Filter results by visits that were created on or before the given timestamp

200.description: Pageable list of visit ids is returned

get.summary: Gets the identifiers for all prisoners. Currently only active prisoners are supported

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Only return active prisoners currently in prison

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role SYNCHRONISATION_REPORTING not present

get.description: Retrieves a paged list of incentive composite ids by filter. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_INCENTIVES.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Filter results by incentives that were created on or after the given date

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Filter results by incentives that were created on or before the given date

parameters.name: latestOnly
parameters.description: if true only retrieve latest incentive for each prisoner

200.description: Pageable list of composite ids are returned

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_INCENTIVES not present

get.summary: get a prisoner's incentive level (a.k.a IEP) by id (bookingId and incentiveId)
get.description: Retrieves a created incentive level for a prisoner. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_INCENTIVES.

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_INCENTIVES not present

get.summary: get a prisoner's current incentive level (a.k.a IEP) for a booking
get.description: Retrieves the current incentive level (by booking) for a prisoner. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_INCENTIVES.

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_INCENTIVES not present

get.description: Get an appointment given the unique event id. Requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

404.description: Booking, location and timestamp combination does not exist

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

get.description: Retrieves a paged list of incentive composite ids by filter. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS.

parameters.name: prisonIds
parameters.description: Filter results by prison ids (returns all prisons if not specified)

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Filter results by appointments that were created on or after the given date

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Filter results by appointments that were created on or before the given date

200.description: Pageable list of composite ids are returned

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_INCENTIVES not present

get.description: Get an appointment given the booking id, internal location, date and start time. Requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

404.description: Booking, location and timestamp combination does not exist

403.description: Forbidden, requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

get.summary: get adjustment IDs (key date and Sentence adjustments) by filter
get.description: Retrieves a paged list of adjustment ids by filter. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_SENTENCING.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Filter results by adjustments that were created on or after the given date

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Filter results by adjustments that were created on or before the given date

200.description: Pageable list of ids are returned

403.description: Forbidden to access this endpoint when role NOMIS_SENTENCING not present

adjustmentTypeCode.description: NOMIS Adjustment type code from SENTENCE_ADJUSTMENTS

adjustmentFromDate.description: Start of the period which contributed to the adjustment

adjustmentDays.description: Number of days for the adjustment

active.description: Flag to indicate if the adjustment is being applied

room.description: Name of the real world room where visit will take place

openClosedStatus.description: Whether visit is restricted to a closed session

adjustmentTypeCode.description: NOMIS Adjustment type code from SENTENCE_ADJUSTMENTS

adjustmentFromDate.description: Start of the period which contributed to the adjustment

adjustmentDays.description: Number of days for the adjustment

active.description: Flag to indicate if the adjustment is being applied

iepDateTime.description: Date and time when last review took place

active.description: active status of the Global Incentive Level

visitOrderAllowance.description: The number of weekday visits for a convicted prisoner per fortnight

privilegedVisitOrderAllowance.description: The number of privileged/weekend visits for a convicted prisoner per 4 weeks

remandTransferLimitInPence.description: The amount transferred weekly from the private cash account to the spends account for a remand prisoner to use

remandSpendLimitInPence.description: The maximum amount allowed in the spends account for a remand prisoner

convictedTransferLimitInPence.description: The amount transferred weekly from the private cash account to the spends account for a convicted prisoner to use

convictedSpendLimitInPence.description: The maximum amount allowed in the spends account for a convicted prisoner

CreatePrisonIncentiveRequest.description: Prison Incentive level data create request

internalLocationId.description: Room where the appointment is to occur (in cell if null)

PayRateRequest.description: Course activity creation request pay rates

startTime.description: Schedule start time in 24 hour clock

endTime.description: Schedule end time in 24 hour clock

ScheduleRuleRequest.description: Course activity creation request schedule rules

internalLocationId.description: Room where the activity is to occur (from activity schedule)

code.description: Code generated from the activity and schedule ids and mapped

prisonId.description: Prison where the activity is to occur

internalLocationId.description: Room where the activity is to occur (from activity schedule)

description.description: Description from concatenated activity and activity schedule

payPerSession.description: Half or Full day (H or F)

startTime.description: Schedule start time in 24 hour clock

endTime.description: Schedule end time in 24 hour clock

date.description: The date of the course schedule

startTime.description: The time of the course schedule

endTime.description: The time the course schedule ends

cancelled.description: Whether the course schedule has been cancelled

courseScheduleId.description: The id of the course schedule

bookingId.description: Booking id of the prisoner currently allocated to the activity

prisonId.description: Prison where the visit is to occur

visitType.description: Visit type, whether social or official

visitComment.description: Comment to be added to visit

visitOrderComment.description: Comment to be added to visit order (if one is created)

room.description: Name of the real world room where visit will take place

openClosedStatus.description: Whether visit is restricted to a closed session

adjustmentTypeCode.description: NOMIS Adjustment type code from SENTENCE_ADJUSTMENTS

adjustmentFromDate.description: Start of the period which contributed to the adjustment

adjustmentDays.description: Number of days for the adjustment

active.description: Flag to indicate if the adjustment is being applied

bookingId.description: The created Nomis booking and sequence

adjustmentTypeCode.description: NOMIS Adjustment type code from SENTENCE_ADJUSTMENTS

adjustmentFromDate.description: Start of the period which contributed to the adjustment

adjustmentDays.description: Number of days for the adjustment

active.description: Flag to indicate if the adjustment is being applied

eventStatus.description: The event status for the attendance

scheduleDate.description: The date of the course schedule

startTime.description: The time of the course schedule

endTime.description: The time the course schedule ends

bookingId.description: Booking id of the prisoner to be allocated to the activity

telephones.description: Ordered list of telephone numbers for contact with latest first

items.description: Ordered list of telephone numbers for contact with latest first

offenderNo.description: The offender number, aka nomsId, prisonerId

prisonId.description: Prison where the visit is to occur

whenUpdated.description: date and time of last update

modifyUserId.description: User id for last visit update

leadVisitor.description: Indicates lead visitor for the visit

offenderNo.description: The offender number, aka nomsId, prisonerId

sentenceSequence.description: The sequence of the sentence within this booking

adjustmentFromDate.description: Start of the period which contributed to the adjustment

adjustmentToDate.description: End of the period which contributed to the adjustment

adjustmentDays.description: Number of days for the adjustment

active.description: Flag to indicate if the adjustment is being applied

hiddenFromUsers.description: Flag to indicate the adjustment is hidden from end users. This is true when it was created as part of a key date adjustment

offenderNo.description: The offender number, aka nomsId, prisonerId

adjustmentFromDate.description: Start of the period which contributed to the adjustment

adjustmentToDate.description: End of the period which contributed to the adjustment

adjustmentDays.description: Number of days for the adjustment

active.description: Flag to indicate if the adjustment is being applied

sequence.description: The sequence of the incentive within this booking

offenderNo.description: The offender number, aka nomsId, prisonerId

incentiveSequence.description: The sequence of the incentive within this booking

iepDateTime.description: Date and time of Incentive level creation

prisonId.description: Prison where the Incentive level was created

userId.description: User id of user creating prisoner incentive level

currentIep.description: Is this IEP the current IEP for the booking?

auditModule.description: The NOMIS module that created this IEP

whenUpdated.description: date and time of last update
